name: UpdateIssueFollowers
description:
Add or remove followers for an issue.

This tool allows you to add or remove followers to a specific issue. Use it when managing the users who should receive notifications about updates on an issue. Set the operation field to "remove" to remove followers.

parameters.name: issue_id
parameters.description: The ID or number of the issue to add or remove followers from.

value_schema.description: The ID or number of the issue to add followers to.

parameters.name: contact_ids_to_add
parameters.description: An array of contact IDs to add as followers to the issue. Each ID should be a string.

value_schema.description: The IDs of contacts to add as followers.

parameters.name: update_operation
parameters.description: Specify 'add' to add followers or 'remove' to remove them.

value_schema.description: Operation to perform. Use "add" to add followers (default) or "remove" to remove followers.

parameters.name: user_ids_to_add_as_followers
parameters.description: List of user IDs to add as followers to a specific issue.

value_schema.description: The IDs of users to add as followers.
